streamStart.title: Entertainment Started
streamStart.description: {user} started entertaining the crew in the {channel} cabin

streamStop.title: Entertainment Ended
streamStop.description: Th' crew had enough, so {user} stopped entertaining th' crew in the {channel} cabin

videoStart.title: Video Entertainment Started
videoStart.description: {user} started entertaining the crew in the {channel} cabin

videoStop.title: Video Entertainment Ended
videoStop.description: Th' crew had enough, so {user} stopped entertaining th' crew in the {channel} cabin

voiceSwitch.title: Changed Cabin
voiceSwitch.description: {user} went from th' {channel_old} cabin to th' {channel_new} cabin

voiceMove.title: Ordered T' Move
voiceMove.description: {user} was ordered t' move from th' {channel_old} cabin to the {channel_new} cabin

voiceDisconnect.title: Thrown Out
voiceDisconnect.description: {user} was thrown out o' the cabin

serverMute.title: Silence Enforced
serverMute.description: {user} was ordered t' keep thar mouth shut in th' cabin
